overview_summary: None of the three profiled neighbors have a documented stance on the development (all are classified as "unknown" stance). All three also have low community influence, as they are private landowners without notable public roles or local authority.

neighbors.name: Roger & Jennifer Luther
neighbors.claims: Roger and Jennifer Luther are Harlan County landowners (parcel PIN 280006200) in the Orleans area ([harlancounty.ne.gov](https://harlancounty.ne.gov/webpages/assessor/assessor.html#:~:text=Harlan%20County%20Property%20Search)). No local meeting minutes or news reports were found in which the Luthers voiced any views on development ([harlancounty.ne.gov](https://harlancounty.ne.gov/board_meetings/minutes.aspx#:~:text=Board%20Minutes)).

approach_recommendations.engage: With no stated stance or public role, a personal one-on-one approach is best – introduce the project directly and invite their questions or concerns in a respectful conversation.

neighbors.name: James Stoelting
neighbors.claims: James Stoelting owns property in the Orleans vicinity of Harlan County (PIN 280002700) ([harlancounty.ne.gov](https://harlancounty.ne.gov/webpages/assessor/assessor.html#:~:text=Harlan%20County%20Property%20Search)). The Stoelting family is long-established locally – for example, a 2023 obituary noted a John A. Stoelting (65) as formerly of Orleans ([www.legacy.com](https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/kearneyhub/name/john-stoelting-obituary?id=53587968#:~:text=John%20A,is%20in%20charge%20of%20arrangements)) – but no public statements from James on development were found ([harlancounty.ne.gov](https://harlancounty.ne.gov/board_meetings/minutes.aspx#:~:text=Board%20Minutes)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Leverage community familiarity – since the Stoeltings have local roots, approach James through a friendly, informal conversation emphasizing respect for the community’s heritage and being open to any concerns he might have.

neighbors.name: Marlen L. & Beverly E. Lewis
neighbors.claims: Marlen L. and Beverly E. Lewis are listed as owners of a Harlan County parcel (PIN 280005300) near Orleans ([harlancounty.ne.gov](https://harlancounty.ne.gov/webpages/assessor/assessor.html#:~:text=Harlan%20County%20Property%20Search)). They have no known record of civic positions or commentary on local development issues in public sources ([harlancounty.ne.gov](https://harlancounty.ne.gov/board_meetings/minutes.aspx#:~:text=Board%20Minutes)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Because the Lewis family has not voiced an opinion, engage them with transparency and courtesy. A straightforward outreach explaining the project and inviting their feedback will help address any private concerns they may have.
